items.name: Energy IV Drip
items.description: Nutrient cocktail administered intravenously. You'll feel refreshed.

items.name: Appetite Enhancement Drip
items.description: Hormone infusion that expands your hunger. Side effects include drooling.

items.name: Serotonin Infusion
items.description: Liquid happiness, delivered directly to your bloodstream.

items.name: Recovery Drip
items.description: Post-binge special. Settles the stomach and clears the head.

items.name: Performance Infusion
items.description: Temporary charm enhancement. The confidence is chemical.

items.name: Metabolism Slowdown
items.description: Procedure to reduce calorie burn rate. More efficient storage.

items.name: Stomach Expansion
items.description: Surgical procedure. More room for activities.

items.name: Stamina Treatment
items.description: Gene therapy for enhanced endurance. Sit back and let it work.

items.name: Charm Treatment
items.description: Pheromone gland enhancement. Subtle but effective.

items.name: Style Enhancement
items.description: Cosmetic procedures. Look your best. Takes a while to set.

items.name: Neural Talent Boost
items.description: Brain optimization therapy. Think faster, perform better.

items.name: BB Factor Treatment
items.description: Experimental hormone therapy. Results vary. Requires monitoring.

items.name: Digestive Optimizer
items.description: Cybernetic implant. Process food more efficiently.

items.name: Adrenal Implant
items.description: Never feel tired. Well, rarely. Major surgery required.

items.name: Charisma Chip
items.description: Neural implant for social optimization. Lengthy installation.

items.name: Metabolism Regulator
items.description: Control your body's calorie processing. Complex implant.

items.name: Genetic Resequence
items.description: Complete genetic overhaul. Expensive, thorough, time-consuming.

items.name: Standard Surrogacy Contract
items.description: Basic surrogacy agreement. One fetus, standard compensation.

items.name: Mercenary Surrogacy Contract
items.description: High-risk, high-reward surrogacy. Multiple fetuses, premium rates.
